entry.summary: Re CFTC 和解协议要求币安和赵长鹏将改进公司治理结构，其中包括拥有独立成员的董事会、合规委员会和审计委员会。币安将不再允许现有子账户（包括主要经纪商开设的子账户）绕过平台的合规控制。在对所有现有子账户应用所有 KYC 政策和程序后，币安将关闭所有未能满足合规控制要求的账户。

entry.summary: 根据周一的公告，英国已引入一项新规定，将允许该国的金融监管机构运行一个代币化证券沙盒，新规定将于 2024 年 1 月 8 日生效。沙盒可让公司在监管监督下测试新的解决方案和产品。企业还将得以测试支持加密货币的分布式账本技术，以数字化或代币化传统证券。（CoinDesk） https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=10&id=21801

It is notable that all of recent momentum of bitcoin / solana is copying stuff that ethereum created years ago Wonder what the Dino network has up its sleeve in terms of future innovation

entry.title: RT Mudit Gupta: The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/...
entry.summary: RT Mudit Gupta The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1 and ensure the version is 1.1.8. If it's not, clear your cache. chrome- F12> Chrome Developer Tools > Application tab > Storage in left tree> Clear site data.

entry.summary:
Re @HsakaTrades LFG! https://x.com/defi_educator/status/1731330907217248395?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw
DeFi Educator: 1) BTC pumps >$40k 2) Sidelineoors now need to bet more to make it 3) traders who caught the pump take profit and roll them over into the altcoin casino 4) Money flows from BTC -> Alts = altseason 5) BTC+ETH dominance chart makes a lower low

entry.title: RT Will: Interesting to see the futures basis for ETH on CME is now trading at a 5% premium to the basis for BTC and open interest for ETH on CME is n...
entry.summary: RT Will Interesting to see the futures basis for ETH on CME is now trading at a 5% premium to the basis for BTC and open interest for ETH on CME is now starting to pick up after lagging BTC. Early signs of tradfi starting to rotate into the ETH ETF trade?
